title: What are the QR codes and how do you make a QR code? - Quora

response.answer_text: From wikipedia, QR code (abbreviated from Quick Response Code) is the trademark for a type of matrix barcode (or two-dimensional barcode) first designed in 1994 for the automotive industry in Japan. A barcode is a machine-readable optical label that contains information about the item to which it is attached. In practice, QR codes often contain data for a locator, identifier, or tracker that points to a website or application. A QR code uses four standardized encoding modes (numeric, alphanumeric, byte/binary, and kanji) to store data efficiently; extensions may also be used. To generate a QR code, you need to decide what information (URL, specific ID…) you need to embed into the QR code and then use one of the following online QR code generators. I am attaching references below for online QR code generators : Create QR codes hereThe QR Code GeneratorQR StuffQRCode Monkey - The free QR Code Generator to create custom QR Codes with LogIf you want to generate QR codes programatically through code, please check for libraries in Google relevant to your language of choice. Hope this answer helps you.
